short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cloud based online assessment software for pre-employment and employee skill testing with google apps integration for single sign on

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Interview Mocha is leading online assessment software used by hundreds of global 
companies of all sizes.  

   • 200+ validated ready-to-use tests
   • Hundreds of ready job tests and skill tests
   • Fastest support for custom test creation
   • Scalable and reliable pre-employment testing software
   • Advanced remote proctoring
   • Career page integrations
   • Global customer base, 100+ satisfied clients, customer ranges from startups to      billion dollar enterprises
   • Conducted more than 100,000 tests in last year, growing

Categories of validates tests:
   • Aptitude
   • Business Skills 
   • Coding Skills
   • Communication 
   • Databases
   • Design Tools
   • Digital Marketing
   • ERP
   • Finance
   • Marketing
   • Mobile
   • Office Tools
   • Sales
   • Software Development
